TopicTitle: OMICRON - Flying Space Car Development Thread

Articles.Content:
I don't really know the purpose of your comment, but i can tell, this mercedes is dam ugly. I don't think it is similar to mine, besides the both are flying machines.

I prefer 100% mine.
I prefer yours too, but that other one was awesome for the time period it was presented in.
That movie was super fun!

Which movie now?

How's the flying death machin... I mean, the flying car... coming along?

i believe the movie is "Spaceballs". In my country the name is a little different. (Tem um louco solto no espaÃƒÂ§o, with the direct translation is "There's a crazy one last in space")

This movie is so fun.
That is a hilarious direct translation. Yes, it is definitely a fun movie. Enough fun now, I want my flying car.

You will have it. Faster if i have the right motivation from the community.

Besides that i do when i have inspiration.

+rep

+motivation

short:

DO WANT!
thank you!

Motivation eh? Alright, how's this for motivation... I'm gonna stuff a motorized space car up your -bleeped out in the name of censorship- and use it to rip a new -bleeped out- for your -bleeped out--bleeped out--bleeped out-, got me?

Don't take that one too seriously... and use your imagination. It'll be better that way.

If that one doesn't work, I'm out of ideas. Anyone have a tactical nuke I could threaten him with? Oh come on, you people are no fun at all. Isn't a little nuclear fallout worth it to get a hold of this baby? Jeb would do it... you know he would.

I presume, more ion engines come with this pack?

I will download for my KSP Ion Wars series..this will be my rebel ship!
I am unsure if the engines shown on these pages would count as "ion" engines. They seem more like vtol-enabled low-thrust high-efficiency dual-mode engines. Hard to say from the images though.

Awesome! I can't wait to see this released!

What's the status of this project? Are some parts finished?

I presume, more ion engines come with this pack?

I will download for my KSP Ion Wars series..this will be my rebel ship!

I don't think in more ions 2001kraft. But Saber vtol and atomics on back, but can have more options and will be compatible with other engines from game. Stock and mods.

Awesome! I can't wait to see this released!

What's the status of this project? Are some parts finished?

Yes, some parts are full modeled. But none have cfg and port to Unity/KSP yet.

Still on going. But i'm not rush, doing on the inspirational moments.

Your inspiration is exactly why we have been brainstorming ways to further motivate you. Both real and unconfirmed-to-be-real (aka, totally fake). Right now, the best proposal is to hurl a giant asteroid at your favorite fast food joint and tell you to hurry up or we'll end your future enjoyment of fast food for all eternity. Unfortunately the costs of doing this, plus the possible end of humanity if we get the size/mass ratio wrong and accidentally cause a catastrophic extinction level event across the globe, and the political fallout while the world slowly dies and the remnants of society degrade and devolve into a cannibalistic society of irradiated and malformed subspecies of what was once thought to be an early developmental form of the species known as "human being" while fighting off the advances of the new dominant life form which resembles something from a bad science fiction movie...

... well, you get the picture. I'm still working out the details.

I don't really understand what are you trying to say Gaalidas, but expect some surprises...

Cheers.
Don't worry about it, I don't understand what I'm trying to say half the time anyway.

ahuahuauhauhuahuhauhaha.

ok.

This book has a sort of inspiration for me. For the ones who already read it, will know in some chapter, there are a flying car flying over a forest in Earth, in the search of the lost city of Atlantis.

The good point on this book, is that it put Atlantis citizens as the people who spread knowledge all over the present cities of earth.

The knowledge we have know, like agriculture, astronomy, chemistry, science, etc.

Edited February 28, 2015 by Climberfx

I knew we couldn't have figured all that stuff out ourselves. It had to be either an advanced secretive society, or aliens.

Edited March 1, 2015 by Gaalidas

ahuahauhuahuahua.

Aliens.
or.... oh this one's really good... a secretive society of aliens!
I hope it will be released soon

Hi benjiGH.

My time is taken by my work at the moment, but i will be on it son.

So, be patience, and it will be rewarded

Cheers!
Or don't be patient and we'll have to track you down and land a flying car on your head. If it ever gets done that is...
ahuahuahuahuahuhaua, At least you will let me fly around, because is the thing i'm waiting to be real in life since i was born.
